delete.error:
You cannot delete a workspace that has projects in it.
This workspace has { totalProjects, plural, one {# project} other {# projects} }. Delete the { totalProjects, plural, one {project} other {projects} } first.
delete.deleted_workspace: The workspace {{ var }} has been deleted.

members.title: Members
members.description_modal:
Once they accept the invitation, they will be able to invite new members, create new projects and edit other workspace settings.


Start typing a email or enter multiple addresses separated by a comma.

placeholder.placeholder_title: You are not member of any Workspace yet
placeholder.placeholder_text: Group your projects into workspaces. You decide if they match something as big as an organization or as personal as your pet projects.
